sentences.en: ( It is the question once again of polygenesis versus diffusion from a single origin. )
sentences.cn: ( 再次涉及到不同的游戏发展自同一源头的问题. )

sentences.en: Each report starts with a recap of how we did versus our projections.
sentences.cn: 每份报告开头都扼要回顾了我们的表现和我们的预期目标。
图5-3人物角色与市场划分.

sentences.en: In the poor countries the main concern focused on the question of growth versus income distribution.
sentences.cn: 穷国关注的主要问题是增长与收入分配的关系.

sentences.en: Intimacy versus isolation is the central issue of young adulthood.
sentences.cn: 我认为是与孤独相对的亲密是孩童时代的中心问题.

sentences.en: It is France versus Brazil in the final.
sentences.cn: 决赛是法国队对巴西队。

sentences.en: Only 18.8% of the class of 1982 had some kind of diploma four years after high school, versus 45% of the class of 1972.
sentences.cn: 1982年那一届只有18.8%的学生在中学毕业4年后获得了某种文凭，而1972年那一届这一比例是45％。

sentences.en: The big match tonight is England versus Spain.
sentences.cn: 今晚的大赛是英格兰对西班牙.

sentences.en: The book may use the conventional thriller situation of good versus evil.
sentences.cn: 本书或许用了善恶相争这种常见的惊险情节.

sentences.en: The finance minister must weigh up the benefits of a tax cut versus those of increased public spending.
sentences.cn: 财政部长必须权衡是减税还是增加公共开支更有利。

sentences.en: The most exciting game was Harvard versus Yale.
sentences.cn: 最富紧张刺激的球赛是哈佛队对耶鲁队.

sentences.en: the New York Knicks versus the LA Lakers
sentences.cn: 纽约尼克斯队对洛杉矶湖人队

sentences.en: The oil versus nuclear equation is largely moot.
sentences.cn: 石油和核能之间的关系还很有争议.

sentences.en: the Supreme Court decision in Roe vs. Wade
sentences.cn: 最高法院关于罗诉韦德案的判决

sentences.en: There are different explanations for the use of right versus left.
sentences.cn: 和左侧相比,使用右侧有不同的解释.

sentences.en: Today's televised baseball game is Detroit versus Cleveland.
sentences.cn: 今天电视转播的棒球赛是底特律对抗克利夫兰.

sentences.en: What is the difference between personal computers on the network versus employees?
sentences.cn: 什麽是个人电脑的区别在网络上与雇员?

trans.tran_cn: （表示两队或双方对阵）对，（比较两种不同想法、选择等）与…相对，对抗
trans.tran_en: used to show that two people or teams are competing against each other in a game or court case
